Scanhead

Contains logic for interacting with Arges scanheads

Functions
SelectJob
call Scanhead.SelectJob(
intJobIndex
);

Selects the preloaded Job on the controlled for execution at the passed index.

Parameters
intJobIndex

the index of the desired job to load.

SelectJobByName
call Scanhead.SelectJobByName(
JobName,
&result
);

Selects the preloaded Job on the controller which matches the job name provided for execution.

Parameters
JobName

(string) the full name of the desired job to select.

Response Parameters
&result

the result of the select operation

StartJob
call Scanhead.StartJob();

Starts the selected job then returns control. This should be used for a long running jobs. Job Execution can be monitored with Scanhead.IsJobRunning and Scanhead.AbortJob functions.

See Also

  • Scanhead.IsJobRunning

  • Scanhead.AbortJob

ExecuteJob
call Scanhead.ExecuteJob();

Starts the selected job, waits for job completion, then returns control.

SelectAndStartJob
call Scanhead.SelectAndStartJob(
intJobIndex
);

Selects the preloaded Job on the controlled for execution at the passed index. Then, starts the job and returns.

Parameters
intJobIndex

the index of the desired job to select

See Also

  • Scanhead.SelectJob

  • Scanhead.StartJob

AbortJob
call Scanhead.AbortJob();

Stops an executing job. This will trigger the fail flag on the controller.

IsJobRunning
call Scanhead.IsJobRunning(
&boolResult
);

Return whether or not a job is currently executing on the controller.

Response Parameters
&boolResult

the state of whether or not a job is currently executing on the controller.

ApplyJobParameters
call Scanhead.ApplyJobParameters(
intJobIndex,
intFeature,
intStage,
intSlice
);

Applies the parameters from the Scanhead csv file for the Feature, Stage and Slice to the job at the passed index.

Parameters
intJobIndex

the target job

intFeature

the target feature index

intStage

the target stage index

intSlice

the target slice

See Also

  • Scanhead.IsJobReady

IsJobReady
call Scanhead.IsJobReady(
intJobIndex,
&boolResult
);

Return whether or not parameters are being loaded to the job at the requested index.

Parameters
intJobIndex

The index of the job on the controller

Response Parameters
&boolResult

the state of whether or not parameters are being loaded to the job at the index.

WaitUntilJobReady
call Scanhead.WaitUntilJobReady(
intJobIndex
);

Returns after Job Parameter loading is complete for the Job at the index.

Parameters
intJobIndex

the index of the Job to wait for until parameter loading is complete.

IsJobFileLoaded
call Scanhead.IsJobFileLoaded(
jobFileName,
&boolResult
);

Tests to see if the specified job file is loaded on the controller

Parameters
jobFileName

(string) the path to a job file

Response Parameters
&boolResult

if the path is loaded, TRUE.  Otherwise, FALSE.

ClearJobs
call Scanhead.ClearJobs();

Clears all jobs from the scanhead, and then returns control

GetLensType
call Scanhead.GetLensType(
&scanheadLens
);

For machines with interchangeable lenses, request the currently-detected lens

Response Parameters
&scanheadLens

the detected lens

ExtendBeamExpander
call Scanhead.ExtendBeamExpander();

This function extends the Beam Expander.

RetractBeamExpander
call Scanhead.RetractBeamExpander();

This function retracts the Beam Expander.

LoadDistortionFile
call Scanhead.LoadDistortionFile(
__STRING__DistortionFile
);

Attempt to load the given scanning distortion file

Parameters
__STRING__DistortionFile

(string) the path to a distortion map

SetBinaryVariable
call Scanhead.SetBinaryVariable(
__STRING__VariablePath,
__STRING__BinaryFile,
__byteswap
);

write a binary file to a binary variable on the scanhead

Parameters
__STRING__VariablePath

the full path to the binary variable

__STRING__BinaryFile

the full path to the input file

__byteswap

if TRUE, swap byte ordering prior to applying

SetNumericVariable
call Scanhead.SetNumericVariable(
__STRING__VariablePath,
__NUM__Value
);

write a numeric value to a scanhead variable

Parameters
__STRING__VariablePath

the full path to the numeric variable

__NUM__Value

the numeric value to set

SetTextVariable
call Scanhead.SetTextVariable(
__STRING__VariablePath,
__STRING__Value
)

write a text value to a scanhead variable

Parameters
__STRING__VariablePath

the full path to the numeric variable

__STRING__Value

the text value to set

GetNumericVariable
call Scanhead.GetNumericVariable(
__STRING__VariablePath,
&result
);

Retrieve a numeric variable from the scanhead

Parameters
__STRING__VariablePath

the full path to the numeric variable

Response Parameters
&result

the numeric value

GetTextVariable
call Scanhead.GetTextVariable(
__STRING__VariablePath,
&result
);

Retrieve a text variable from the scanhead

Parameters
__STRING__VariablePath

the full path to the numeric variable

Response Parameters
&result

the text value

LoadJobAsync
call Scanhead.LoadJobAsync(
stringJob,
clearJobFirstFlag
);

Start loading a job, and return control

Parameters
stringJob

the name of the job to load

clearJobFirstFlag

whether or not to clear all jobs before loading the next

See Also

  • Scanhead.IsJobLoading

LoadJob
call Scanhead.LoadJob(
stringJob,
clearJobFirstFlag
);

Load a job, not returning control until the job is loaded

Parameters
stringJob

the name of the job to load

clearJobFirstFlag

whether or not to clear all jobs before loading the next

IsJobLoading
call Scanhead.IsJobLoading(
&boolIsJobLoading
);

Test to see if a job is currently loading.  For use with asynchronous subroutines

Response Parameters
&boolIsJobLoading

TRUE if a job is currently loading

LoadJobDataCsvAsync
call Scanhead.LoadJobDataCsvAsync(
stringPathToDataCsv,
stringPathToArlFile
);

Start loading CSV-based and ARL data to a job, and return control immediately

Parameters
stringPathToDataCsv

the path to the data CSV to load

stringPathToArlFile

the path to ARL data

See Also

  • Scanhead.LoadJobDataCsv

  • Scanhead.IsJobDataCsvLoading

IsJobDataCsvLoading
call Scanhead.IsJobDataCsvLoading(
&boolIsJobLoading
);

Test to see if a job is currently loading CSV and ARL data.  For use with asynchronous subroutines

Response Parameters
&boolIsJobLoading

TRUE if data is currently loading

LoadJobDataCsv
call Scanhead.LoadJobDataCsv(
stringPathToDataCsv,
stringPathToArlFile
);

Start loading CSV-based and ARL data to a job, holding control until the data are loaded

Parameters
stringPathToDataCsv

the path to the data CSV to load

stringPathToArlFile

the path to ARL data

See Also

  • Scanhead.LoadJobDataCsvAsync

SetDeviceManaged
call Scanhead.SetDeviceManaged(
deviceName
);

Instruct the scanhead to treat the specified device as a managed device

Parameters
deviceName

(string) the name of the device

See Also

  • Scanhead.SetDeviceUnmanaged

SetDeviceUnmanaged
call Scanhead.SetDeviceUnmanaged(
deviceName
);

Instruct the scanhead to treat the specified device as an unmanaged device

Parameters
deviceName

(string) the name of the device

See Also

  • Scanhead.SetDeviceManaged

DeleteJobByName
call Scanhead.DeleteJobByName(
stringJob
);

Delete jobs with the specified name

Parameters
stringJob

the job name

GetRecoveryData
call Scanhead.GetRecoveryData(
&feature,
&stage,
&slice
);

If the machine was shut down in an emergency circumstance, attempt to recover job data prior to shutdown

Response Parameters
&feature

the recovered feature index

&stage

the recovered stage index

&slice

the recovered slice index

StartFromRecoverySlice
call Scanhead.StartFromRecoverySlice(
jobIndex
);

If the machine was shut down in an emergency circumstance, attempt to start the specified job at the last known slice

Parameters
jobIndex

the index of the job to attempt to resume

StartFromSlice
call Scanhead.StartFromSlice(
jobIndex,
startSlice
);

Start the specified job at the specified slice

Parameters
jobIndex

the index of the job to run

startSlice

the first slice to run

StopAtSlice
call Scanhead.StopAtSlice(
jobIndex,
stopSlice
);

Stop the specified job at the specified slice

Parameters
jobIndex

the index of the job

startSlice

the last slice to run
